text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Administrator" means the Administrator of the Division of State Documents.
"Committee" means the Joint Committee on Administrative, Executive, and Legislative Review.
"Mandate" means a directive in a regulation that requires a local government unit to perform a task or assume a responsibility that has a discernible fiscal impact on the local government unit.

section.section:
"Regulation" does not include:
a statement that:
a response of the unit to a petition for adoption of a regulation, under § 10-123 of this subtitle; or
a declaratory ruling of the unit as to a regulation, order, or statute, under Subtitle 3 of this title.
"Regulation", as used in §§ 10-110 and 10-111.1 of this subtitle, means all or any portion of a regulation.

text.section:
"Substantively" means in a manner substantially affecting the rights, duties, or obligations of:
a member of a regulated group or profession; or
a member of the public.
"Unit" means an officer or unit authorized by law to adopt regulations.
